description: Explore the dynamic open source licensing debates during Donald Trump's presidency, highlighting key discussions on copyleft versus permissive licenses, national security, ethical licensing, and the influence of Big Tech. Discover how political climates intersect with technological communities, shaping the future of open source.
keywords: open source licensing, Trump era, copyleft, permissive licenses, national security, ethical licensing, Big Tech, political influence, software debates
title: Navigating Open Source Licensing Debates During the Trump Era
